name: PACMAN Curse of the Slimers
description:
This is a fan made game of  the classic PacMan for ZX Spectrum 48k

It was made to coincide with the 40th birthday of the original.

The controls are QAOP, but are redefinable.

The game includes different mazes from the classic game, Ms Pacman, a mini version, and also some original.  

The game is free to download as it is a clone,/copy and there is no intention to profit from this game, but any donations are greatly appreciated and will encourage me to make more games for the Spectrum/Next

Currently only a snapshot file, but will be available as a TAP soon.
